l:dependency.name: Timestamper
l:dependency.l:description: Adds timestamps to the Console Output

l:dependency.name: OWASP Java HTML Sanitizer
l:dependency.l:description: Takes third-party HTML and produces HTML that is safe to embed in your web application. Fast and easy to configure.

l:dependency.name: Apache Commons Lang
l:dependency.l:description: Apache Commons Lang, a package of Java utility classes for the classes that are in java.lang's hierarchy, or are considered to be so standard as to justify existence in java.lang.
